channel.title: How to make a PvP area [317] [DELTA] and make a safe area [done in tutorial]
channel.description:
This tutorial is to show you how to make a working PvP area Difficulty 1/10 :o Base: Delta, Might work for you on another base.. beats me. You might get lots of compiling errors, thats why get a copy of your source before trying.. needed files: Client.Java. PLEASE DO NOT COMMENT IF YOU HAVE A BETTER WAY OR IF THIS IS A BAD WAY, Thanks. Tested on: Delta. Step 1: Open up your Client.Java and search for: [code] public boolean isInPitRoom [/code]
You should find something like this: [code] public boolean isInPitRoom() { if((absX >= 2529 && absX <= 2546 && absY >= 4710 && absY <=4725)) return true; else return false; } [/code] Under that add: [code] public boolean isInNAMEOFYOURPVPAREA() { if((absX >= smallestXcoord && absX <= BiggestXcoord && absY >= SmallestYcoord && absY <=BiggestYcoord)) return true; else return false; } [/code] NOTE: The isInPVPAREA has to be spelled exactly the same or it would give you errors, it has to include all capitals. For an easy way just copy the isInNAMEOFYOURPVPAREA Replace the NAME OF YOUR PVP area to the name you would like it to be and the smallest coord to biggest.
Next search: [code]public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {[/code] Under that you should find something like this: [code]if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || (absX >= 2935) && (absX <= 2941) && (absY >= 3152) && (absY <=3156)) { return true;[/code] Explaining the code: [code] the public boolean is in wilderness declares that these coords are wilderness and the type == 2 coords declare that the areas added next to it is non-wildy.[/code]
Add this under if (Type == 1) { replace the smallest coord and biggest to your smallest coord to biggest! [code] || (absX >= YoursmallestXcoord) && (absX <= BiggestXcoord) && (absY >= SmallestYcoord) && (BiggestYcoord) [/code] [code]explaining the code:[/code] The point of this is to declare that place, it means, if you want your area to not allow you to teleport you should use your public boolean NAMEOFYOURPVPAREA to make it something look like this: [code] if(isinYourpvpareasname()){ sM("you cannot teleport away"); return; [/code]
[b]or, add the coords next to type == 2 to make those coords a safe area, your done making a wilderness safe.[/b]
When you do that, you are done, here comes the [b]HARD Part[/b]. If you get any Dieng Glitches, HP glitches or you cant attack. No worries. Search out: [code] inPitGame() [/code] You should find something like this: [code]if (isInPitRoom() || inPitGame() || isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == true && AttackingOn2.isInWilderness(AttackingOn2.absX, AttackingOn2.absY, 1) == true) {[/code]Add next to inPitGame() - or any thing else you have [code] || isInyourpvparea() [/code] Keep searching inPitGame() and adding next to it your pvp areas name. and remember for it to be exactly the same for example if it was: [code]!inPitGame()[/code] you add [code]!isInYOURPVPAREASNAME()[/code] or: [code]AttackingOn2.inPitGame() or AttackingOn2.!inPitGame()[/code] You add: [code]AttackingOn2.YOURPVPAREASNAME() or AttackingOn2.!YOURPVPAREASNAME()[/code]
or easily just click edit --> replace in your client.java and replace:
[code]inPitGame() to YOURPVPAREASNAME()[/code]
At the end it should look something like this: it's just a little something i tested on my server, PLEASE DONT DO SUCH A CRAPPY BOXING ARENA LIKE ME...! [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/boxingarena.jpg[/img]
Report any wrong Codes, and ill update it right away.
Other tutorials: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,463918.0.html[/url] - Npc dialogue and player dialogue
[b]Comment so this topic can Live![/b]

item.title: How to make a PvP area [317] [DELTA] and make a safe area [done in tutorial]
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“pingisme, post:49, topic:333327”]there is no isinpitroom you loveing penis sucker go burn[/quote]why the love would you bump a 3 year old topic, add this in your client if you cant find pits room

/*
 *Makes a wild area with the destruct.
 */
public void makePvpArea(){
	destruct();
}

and once you add that search for public void initialize and add

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a PvP area [317] [DELTA] and make a safe area [done in tutorial]
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[quote=“iMrNigga, post:35, topic:333327”]0.o?
This for make safe area?[/quote]
read the title…![quote=“iMrNigga, post:33, topic:333327”]Wohoo! It workeds! Thanks dude!
But i don’t understand how to make a safe zone.
I tryed to figure, but it’s not the same, Could sum1 help me?[/quote]
Search type == 2 and add the coords for your safe area next to the other codes…

DeathSlay:

now dose this make it safe pk? because i really need a safe pk box

i kinda explained this before…
look
just follow the tutorial carefully and it’ll be a safe pk box, cause this is all about how to make safe pvp area’s

[quote=“ytuio9, post:4, topic:333327”]you didn’t explain any part of the code. also, you can’t tell us not to post if we think it’s not good - you’re misinforming beginners. ALSO, this has already been posted.

original post:

|| (absX >= YoursmallestXcoord) && (absX <= BiggestXcoord) && (absY >= SmallestXCOORD) && (BiggestXcoord)

no… one is for your X co-ords and one is for your Y co-ords

also, if you add the co-ordinates to both your new area name and your original wilderness boolean, then you get screwed because there will be an error when it chooses between either the original one or the new one and it will probably work by sequence. and if you add the co-ords to your original wilderness boolean, then you don’t even have to add them to your attacking methods because then you’re basically adding them to your wilderness boolean, and you can attack when using the original wilderness boolean.

overall, this is a pretty poor tutorial on how to add a PvP area and isn’t even explained.[/quote]
sorry man, i just notice that mistake… lol - fixed

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a PvP area [317] [DELTA] and make a safe area [done in tutorial]
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[quote=“123kdd100, post:5, topic:333327”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=429738.msg3155657#msg3155657 date=1269026388]
you didn’t explain any part of the code. also, you can’t tell us not to post if we think it’s not good - you’re misinforming beginners. ALSO, this has already been posted.

original post:

|| (absX >= YoursmallestXcoord) && (absX <= BiggestXcoord) && (absY >= SmallestXCOORD) && (BiggestXcoord)

no… one is for your X co-ords and one is for your Y co-ords

also, if you add the co-ordinates to both your new area name and your original wilderness boolean, then you get screwed because there will be an error when it chooses between either the original one or the new one and it will probably work by sequence. and if you add the co-ords to your original wilderness boolean, then you don’t even have to add them to your attacking methods because then you’re basically adding them to your wilderness boolean, and you can attack when using the original wilderness boolean.

overall, this is a pretty poor tutorial on how to add a PvP area and isn’t even explained.
[/quote]

  1. this tutuorial is supposto be for ppl who understand these codes.
  2. You have no idea what your talking about, this is tested.
    added “explaining the codes”:
    happy?[/quote]

You’re retarded! That other guy is 100% right and after pointing your messup out, you still failed to fix it and instead insulted him.

|| (absX >= YoursmallestXcoord) && (absX <= BiggestXcoord) && (absY >= SmallestXCOORD) && (BiggestXcoord)

should be:

|| (absX >= YoursmallestXcoord) && (absX <= BiggestXcoord) && (absY >= SmallestYcoord) && (BiggestYcoord)

why on earth would you need four x coords? Plus in the code it even tells you that you need Y coords (see the “(absY >=”)

Get your facts straight. Nothing makes you look more retarded then when you flame some one about being wrong when it is really you who fked up.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a PvP area [317] [DELTA] and make a safe area [done in tutorial]
item.dc:creator: @plompke plompke
item.description:
@plompke wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:29, topic:333327”][quote author=plompke link=topic=429738.msg3257656#msg3257656 date=1278253162]

you should have it if you’re using deltascape. it DOES matter if you have it
[/quote]im not using deltascape .

i hope you know that the difference between deltascape and a deltascape-based server is only in what the player added. in other words, your server might NOT be named deltascape but actually be a deltascape base.
anyways, you could try finding isInPvP or isInWilderness.[/quote]i have something like

public boolean isinsafewild

i dont rlly need the safewild , could i change it to the area i want? thx

Read full topic

you should have it if you’re using deltascape. it DOES matter if you have it

anyways, you could try finding isInPvP or isInWilderness.
